The work contained here has been collaboratively conducted by the [Korstanje Lab](https://www.jax.org/research-and-faculty/research-labs/the-korstanje-lab) and [Churchill Lab](https://www.jax.org/research-and-faculty/research-labs/the-churchill-lab) at [The Jackson Laboratory](https://www.jax.org/). We used the [Diversity Outbred](https://www.jax.org/strain/009376) mice, a powerful genetic resource for high resolution mapping, to model renal aging in a geneticaly diverse population.
<br>
<br>
This online resource provides source code used to conduct analyses and produce figures and tables that appear in our publication.
